summary: This document contains financial statements from Bear Stearns & Co. Inc. detailing various transactions, including repurchase and reverse repurchase transactions involving Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation. It outlines account balances, income summaries, and transaction details over several months in 2003.

persons.name: Liz Lynett
persons.context: Liz Lynett is mentioned as the account executive for the financial trust company, overseeing account management.

locations: 383 Madison Avenue, New York, New York 10179
keyFacts: The document includes multiple financial statements from Bear Stearns & Co. Inc. for various dates in 2003.
Transactions include repurchase and reverse repurchase agreements with Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation.
The statements detail account balances, income summaries, and transaction details, indicating significant financial activity.
There are mentions of various securities and financial instruments, including government bonds and mortgage-backed securities.
The document is marked as confidential and contains sensitive financial information.
